description: Thompson was a threat to the killer.
Killer has deeper hidden motives. Thompson was just in the way and getting rid of him will futher a sinister plot.
Thompson was poisoned in a gas leak accident and the scene was made to look like a suicide.
Killer colluded with another suspect to murder Thompson to take blame off the mastermind.
Killer dislikes Thompson's agendas and killed him to send a political message.
Crime of passion, killer simply hates Thompson and killed him in rage.
options: Holds a deep grudge over disrespectful encounter
